text: Could you share what u did? just curious..
Yeah, fairly sure it's a drag-and-drop thing. Bummer.

I have a "blog field" which uses a repeater to allow me to select multiple blog types, I then loop through that to grab blog posts from each type, however, it only returns an ID for the blog type, is there a way I can return the name of the blog type? So for example Blog or Test blog rather than 8438428484328 for example?
